name: staff of magical concentration
description: A quarterstaff engraved with magical runes, designed to enhance the focus of spellcasters by channeling their magic through it. In a pinch, it makes a good melee weapon. It also boasts a slight increase in mana reserves to its wielder.

name: arcane puddle staff

name: divine staff
description: A quarterstaff engraved with religious symbology, marketed towards clerics for their spellcasting. In a pinch, it makes a good melee weapon. It also boasts a slight increase in eyesight to its wielder.

name: dark focusing staff
description: A quarterstaff engraved with otherworldly symbology. In a pinch, it makes a good melee weapon. It is capable of minor spellcasting, though reliant on the skill of its wielder.
